dmca.title: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 14, 2005 9:13 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.

July 14, 2005

Re: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. 

To The Planet:

We are in receipt of your letter dated July 11, 2005 concerning the web site
www.soreplicas.net. We have reviewed the site and confirmed that
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is no longer the ISP. We appreciate
your cooperation and thank you for your assistance in this matter. 

Sincerely, 

Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP



IRS CIRCULAR 230 NOTICE: IRS CIRCULAR 230 REQUIRES THAT WE ADVISE YOU THAT
ANY U.S. FEDERAL TAX ADVICE CONTAINED IN THIS COMMUNICATION OR IN ANY
ATTACHMENT HERETO IS NOT INTENDED OR WRITTEN TO BE USED, AND CANNOT BE USED,
FOR PURPOSE OF (I) AVOIDING PENALTIES UNDER THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OR
(II) PROMOTING, MARKETING OR RECOMMENDING TO ANOTHER PARTY ANY TRANSACTION
OR MATTER ADDRESSED HEREIN.
This message is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to
which it is addressed, and may contain information that is privileged
confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader
of this message is not the intended recipient, or the employee or agent
responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are
hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this
communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this
communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone, and
delete this message from your system. Thank you.
